entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0167.10100] In the statement 003 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Income (Loss) and Comprehensive Income (Loss) the filer has defined multiple root calculation elements. It is expected that the calculation tree in this disclosure is a single tree and not multiple trees. The existence of multiple tree's indicate that there is a calculation missing. The root element NetIncomeLoss has sibling root elements of us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense, us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss, us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax in the filing. The sibling element us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss, us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense should appear as a calculation descendant of NetIncomeLoss. To fix the issue a parent calculation element should be defined for the element(s) us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss, us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense to create a single tree. The element us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLoss, us-gaap:NonoperatingIncomeExpense is defined as calculation descendant of NetIncomeLoss in the US GAAP taxonomy.
Rule Element Id:10100 Rule version: 23.0.7 -
